results.content_en:
聯絡我們」部分所列的資料與
我們的資料保護主任聯絡。
，
如閣下搬遷/已搬遷至歐洲聯盟(「歐盟」)司法管轄區,我們可能需要向閣下提供進一步資料,且閣下可能在歐盟《通用數據保障條例》下享有額外權
利。此類資料及此等權利均載於本公司網站上的私隱通知中。
我們會不時更新我們的私隱通知,並建議閣下瀏覽本公司網站以了解該私隱通知。該私隱通知可在本公司網站
[https://www.prudential.com.hk/scws/pages/tc/privacy-policy/index.html〕 上查閱。閣下填妥並繼續提交本表格,即表示閣下確認已閱讀並
理解本收集個人資料聲明。
業務合作夥伴指我們的服務供應商、提供行政、電信、電腦、信息技術、數據處理及儲存、客戶滿意度分析、支付、印刷、贖回或其他服務予我們,以使
我們能夠經營我們業務,會計師、審計師、IT 服務和平台供應商、保險中介機構、再保險承保人、投資經理、
代理、退休金受託人(和其他持分者)、計劃顧問、介紹人、核准的第三方金融和保險產品供應商以及我們的法
律顧問。
3 / 4
PRMTTP0303
CASHIER/TTPPC (06/24)(Customer version 客戶版本)
Personal Information Collection Statement 收集個人資料聲明
營銷合作夥伴指我們的服務供應商提供行政、電信、電腦、支付、印刷、第三方獎賞/會員/優惠計劃、醫療/健康/保健相關產品、贖回或其他服務,以使
我們能夠經營我們業務、保險中介、退休金受託人(和其他持分者)、計劃顧問、介紹人和核准的第三方金融和保險產品供應商。
Are you currently a customer in mainland China? 您現在是否是個中國內地客戶?
Yes 是
(If "Yes", please tick below box to agree the following statement. If you disagree with this statement, we may not be able to
process your request / application. 如「是」,請勾選以下選項以同意下列聲明。如您不同意以下聲明,我們可能無法處理您的指示/申請。)
By ticking this box, you agree that as an international group company, in order to provide insurance-related products
or services, we may need to store and process your personal information outside of mainland China. Please refer to
our Privacy Notice (https://www.prudential.com.hk/en/china-personal-information-protection-law/) for more
information.
勾選此項,表示您同意,我們作為國際集團公司,為提供保險相關產品或服務,可能需要在中國內地境外存儲或處理您的個人信息。更多
資訊,請參閱我們的隱私聲明(https://www.prudential.com.hk/tc/china-personal-information-protection-law/)。
No 否
Payor's Declaration 付款人聲明
I, the above-named Payor, hereby confirm and declare to Prudential that:
1. The information provided by me in this Notification Form is true, accurate and can be relied upon by Prudential; and
2. I shall bear all charges imposed both by my bank (i.e. the paying bank) and by Prudential's receiving bank to ensure that the
correct amount of insurance premium is transferred to Prudential's bank account; and
3. I understand and agree that if I fail to provide all necessary information and supporting document(s) required by this
Notification Form to Prudential within 3 months from the date of Prudential's receipt of my TT or Local TT payment, such TT or
Local TT payment will be refunded by Prudential to me net of any bank charges incurred at my expense; and
4. I have only submitted this Notification Form once and have not submitted any duplicated copies of this Notification Form and/or
supporting document(s) to Prudential; and
5. I understand and agree that Prudential reserves the right to be indemnified by me for any loss that it may suffer due to any
misrepresentation, non-disclosure, duplicated notification of TT or Local TT payment, and/or fraud or negligence committed by
me in relation to the TT or Local TT payment as described in this Notification Form .; and
6. I understand and agree that under all circumstances, Prudential shall not be responsible for any losses or costs, or any delay of
premium settlement as a result of or in connection with the use of TT or Local TT payment; and
7. I understand and accept the above Personal Information Collection Statement of Prudential.

二. 本人確定上述資料為真實及準確及可被保誠信賴;及

=.
本人明白及同意,如果電匯或本地電匯付款已存於保誠的賬戶超過三個月,但沒有提交有效的電匯及本地電匯繳付保費通知書和所需要的資料,電
滙或本地電匯款項將退還給付款人並扣除任何銀行費用的支出;及
四.
本人證實只有提交此通知書及沒有提交任何重複的電匯及本地電匯付款通知書及/或證明文件予保誠;及
五. 本人明白及同意保誠保留向本人全數追討任何因本人在此通知書中的任何失實陳述,不披露,重複的電匯或本地電匯通知,及/或欺詐行為或疏忽而

results.title_name_tc: 更改自動保費貸款選項
results.content_en:
PRUDENTIAL
英 國
保 誠本
1
Consultant's Name
顧問姓名:
Division - Agent Code
組別-營業員編號:
Proposal / Policy Number(s)
申請書編號/保單號碼:
Life Proposed / Life Assured's Name
受保人姓名:
Application Form for Automatic Premium Loan Option
自動保費貸款選項申請表
Automatic Premium Loan Option
自動保費貸款選項
Declaration
聲明
I request to apply Automatic Premium Loan clause to the policy which the amount of premium or premium and levy shall be automatically
deemed to be paid by a premium loan and extend to the premium(s) or premium(s) and levy(ies) for any supplementary benefit(s) when the
Plan is paid up.
本人申請應用自動保費貸款條文於此保單,即保費或保費及徵費將自動以貸款的形式繳交,並延續條文於本計劃已繳清所有保費時的附加保障之保費
或保費及徵費。
I declare that I have read and confirm understanding of the important notes below.
本人在此聲明本人已閱讀並確認明白下列注意事項之內容。
Important Notes
注意事項
1. We shall charge you interest on the Automatic Premium Loan(s) starting from the date when the respective Automatic Premium Loan(s)
is incurred. We shall determine the interest rate charged on the Automatic Premium Loan(s).
本公司將會由自動保費貸款日期開始收取自動保費貸款的利息,有關利率將由本公司釐訂。
2. The policy will be automatically terminated once the total outstanding loan amount (including interest) owing to us under your policy
exceeds stated percentage on Policy Contract of the guaranteed cash value of your policy minus all Advanced Claims being paid and / or
payable of this Plan.
本計劃將在 閣下的保單所欠本公司之未償還總金額(包括利息)超過合約訂明比率之保單保證現金價值扣除於本計劃須支付及/或已付訖的預
支賠償總額時立即終止。
I/We declare that I/we have read and confirm understanding of the above content.
本人/吾等在此聲明本人/吾等已閱讀並確認明白上述之內容。
Day
日
Month
月
Year
年

(if other than the Life Proposed / Life
Assured)
投保人/保單持有人簽署(如投保人/保單持有
人與受保人同為一人,可免簽署此欄)

(who has attained age 18 or above)
受保人簽署(適用於十八歲或以上的受保人)

顧問 ( 即見證人 ) 簽署
Name 姓名:
Two witnesses are required if signature chop or fingerprint is used to sign. 若以圖章蓋印或指紋簽署,須有兩位見證人。
Please DO NOT sign on BLANK form. 請勿在空白表格上簽署。

本公司將會由自動保費貸款日期開始收取自動保費貸款的利息,有關利率將由本公司釐訂。
2. The policy will be automatically terminated once the total outstanding loan amount (including interest) owing to us under your policy
exceeds stated percentage on Policy Contract of the guaranteed cash value of your policy minus all Advanced Claims being paid and / or
payable of this Plan.
本計劃將在 閣下的保單所欠本公司之未償還總金額(包括利息)超過合約訂明比率之保單保證現金價值扣除於本計劃須支付及/或已付訖的預
支賠償總額時立即終止。

results.title_name_en: Trustee Service with BOCT
results.title_name_tc: 交銀信託提供之保單信託服務
results.content_en:
st application with Bank of Communications Trustee (thereafter
shortened as "BOCT")
b) Obtain confirmation with BOCT by issuing Trust Deeds, usually around 3 -4
weeks.
c) Agents will be notified by BOCT and should prepare the policy change form,
i.e. Beneficiary Appointment Form with Policyowner's signature to
Prudential accordingly, pending attachments as specified in item 3 below. The
workflow shall follow the existing practice as set forth by Life Administration.
Version: Dec 12, 2007 (Final)d) The required documents (see item 3 below) will be submitted by BOCT to Life
Administration and the Company reserves the right to call for additional
documents for incomplete cases.
e) Upon completion, Company will issue confirmation notices to the Policyowner
(with cc copy to agent).
f) Future correspondence will be sent to original Policyowner subsequent to the
confirmation as usual (as there is no change in policy ownership).
2. Minimum Requirement for setting up policy trust with BOCT
- By Sum Insured: Not less than HK$3 Million (including policy issued with
Prudential and other companies)
- By Assets: Not less than HK$3 Million (including cash value of policy and other
tangibles assets and properties)
- Discretion will be exercised by Bank of Communication Trustee if the above
amount is not met.
- Applying the usual practice of excluding US citizens from the purchase of
investment linked plan, the same restriction will be applied to the discretionary
beneficiaries as set out in the Trust, plus the exclusion for Japanese citizens for all
plans.
3. Documents required for submission to Life Administration
(in accordance with the best practice laid down in the guidance notes of OCI)
- Trust Deed containing Settlor name and beneficiaries name in full
- Relationship declaration of the beneficiaries as contained in the Trust Application
Form or any other supplementary sheet
- Nationality of the Settlor and the beneficiaries (US citizenship will be excluded
for linked policies, Japanese citizenship for all policies, see item 2 above)
4. Responsibilities
4.1 Agent's role
- Agent shall act a referrer and should play no active role in the trust application.
Agents are strongly advised not to give advice on the type of trust and the
consequence, and shall from time to time, refer the client to consult sales staff
from BOCT or their own lawyer if in doubt.
- Agent has NO obligation to sign as witness during the trust application.
- Agent can decide on his own whether to join the sales meeting with the service
provider or not.
- Agent has NO commission from Bank of Communication Trustee in any
Version: Dec 12, 2007 (Final)

results.title_name_en: reference material
results.title_name_tc: 參考資料
results.content_en:
the new Policyowner is a tax resident of Macau, the TIN is the Macau Identity Card Number.
如新保單持有人為澳門稅務居民,稅務編號是其澳門身份證號碼。
If the new Policyowner is a tax resident of China, the TIN is the China Identity Card Number.
如新保單持有人為中國稅務居民,稅務編號是其中國身份證號碼。
If the new Policyowner is a U.S. citizen, permanent resident ("Green Card" holder), or otherwise a U.S. tax resident, U.S. social security number is equivalent to TIN.
如果新保單持有人為美國公民,永久居民(“綠咭”持有人),或美國稅務居民,稅務編號是其美國社會福利保障號碼。
LAPA/DATTPM (03/22)R
5
DATTPM0105Part 7 第七部分 Revocation and Appointment of Beneficiary(ies)撤銷及委任受益人
1. Once Prudential have accepted your request for appointment of beneficiary(ies), this form will form part of the Policy. Such change will be effective from
the date when you signed this form, whether or not the Life Assured is alive at the time when we endorsed such change. All previous designation of
beneficiary(ies) and trustee(s) under the Policy shall be revoked. All death benefit thereafter shall be paid and allocated to the beneficiary(ies) and / or
trustee(s) listed below in Part 7. 有關受益人委任一經保誠接納,則會成為本保單的一部分。不論受保人當時是否在生,有關更改即於閣下
簽署此表格日期起生效。所有於較早前在本保單下委任的受益人及信託人將被取替。此後,一切身故賠償將根據此表格第七部分所列
之受益人及/或信託人作出支付及分配。
2. The total share for each group of beneficiary(ies) must be 100% (to share equally according to Prudential's guideline unless otherwise stated). H / f /
獲分配的百分比總和必須為100%(如沒有特別聲明,賠償則會按保誠的守則平均分配)
。
3. To appoint secondary beneficiary, primary beneficiary must be appointed in advance. The designation of secondary beneficiary(ies) will only be effective if all
primary beneficiaries are deceased. 如需委任候補受益人,必須先委任基本受益人。候補受益人的委任必須於所有基本受益人身故後方才生效。
4. If the beneficiary is NOT an immediate family member (including spouse, parent, children, siblings, or grandparent) of the life assured, it is a MUST to provide
identity document / passport number of the beneficiary in this form. 如受益人並非受保人之直系親屬(包括配偶 /父母/ 子女/ 兄弟姊妹 /
祖父母),必須於此表格提供受益人之身份證/護照號碼。
5. Financial Consultant cannot be the beneficiary, unless she / he is the immediate family member of life assured. 理財顧問如非受保人的直系親屬,不得
成為受益人。
6. There is no restriction on the age of beneficiary(ies), but payment of benefit to any minors shall be subject to the provisions of the Policy (if applicable).
受益人的年齡不受限制,但向未成年人士支付的利益將受本保單的條款限制(如適用)。
7. If the intended beneficiary is a business entity / trust fund / trust company, it is required to submit along with this form (i) Business Registration number of
the party concerned; and (ii) a copy of Business Registration Certificate or Certificate of Incorporation; and (iii) a copy of latest Annual Return. $02 1FA'S
受益人為一商業實體/信託基金/信託公司,必須連同此表格一併遞交(i)其商業登記號碼,及(i)商業登記證或公司註冊證明書之副本及
(ii) 最新的周年申報表之副本。
8. To name a Charitable Institution as the Beneficiary (policy donation) with over 50% of policy benefit or an amount more than HK$1 Million, a written
declaration signed by the Policyowner should be provided. 如捐贈 50% 以上保單利益或其金額超過一百萬港元予慈善團體,保單持有人必須提供
已簽署書面聲明。
9. If your application of Transfer of Policy Ownership in Part 1 of this form is not accepted by Prudential due to whatever reason, your request for beneficiary
appointment made in this part of the form will not be processed. 若保誠因任何原因未能接納閣下於此表格第一部分的保單權益轉讓申請,閣下
於此表格本部分內的委任受益人要求將不獲處理。

DATTPM0105Part 7 第七部分 Revocation and Appointment of Beneficiary(ies)撤銷及委任受益人
1. Once Prudential have accepted your request for appointment of beneficiary(ies), this form will form part of the Policy. Such change will be effective from
the date when you signed this form, whether or not the Life Assured is alive at the time when we endorsed such change. All previous designation of
beneficiary(ies) and trustee(s) under the Policy shall be revoked. All death benefit thereafter shall be paid and allocated to the beneficiary(ies) and / or
trustee(s) listed below in Part 7. 有關受益人委任一經保誠接納,則會成為本保單的一部分。不論受保人當時是否在生,有關更改即於閣下
簽署此表格日期起生效。所有於較早前在本保單下委任的受益人及信託人將被取替。此後,一切身故賠償將根據此表格第七部分所列
之受益人及/或信託人作出支付及分配。
2. The total share for each group of beneficiary(ies) must be 100% (to share equally according to Prudential's guideline unless otherwise stated). H / f /
獲分配的百分比總和必須為100%(如沒有特別聲明,賠償則會按保誠的守則平均分配)
。
3. To appoint secondary beneficiary, primary beneficiary must be appointed in advance. The designation of secondary beneficiary(ies) will only be effective if all
primary beneficiaries are deceased. 如需委任候補受益人,必須先委任基本受益人。候補受益人的委任必須於所有基本受益人身故後方才生效。
4. If the beneficiary is NOT an immediate family member (including spouse, parent, children, siblings, or grandparent) of the life assured, it is a MUST to provide
identity document / passport number of the beneficiary in this form. 如受益人並非受保人之直系親屬(包括配偶 /父母/ 子女/ 兄弟姊妹 /
祖父母),必須於此表格提供受益人之身份證/護照號碼。
5. Financial Consultant cannot be the beneficiary, unless she / he is the immediate family member of life assured. 理財顧問如非受保人的直系親屬,不得
成為受益人。
6. There is no restriction on the age of beneficiary(ies), but payment of benefit to any minors shall be subject to the provisions of the Policy (if applicable).
受益人的年齡不受限制,但向未成年人士支付的利益將受本保單的條款限制(如適用)。
7. If the intended beneficiary is a business entity / trust fund / trust company, it is required to submit along with this form (i) Business Registration number of
the party concerned; and (ii) a copy of Business Registration Certificate or Certificate of Incorporation; and (iii) a copy of latest Annual Return. $02 1FA'S
受益人為一商業實體/信託基金/信託公司,必須連同此表格一併遞交(i)其商業登記號碼,及(i)商業登記證或公司註冊證明書之副本及
(ii) 最新的周年申報表之副本。
8. To name a Charitable Institution as the Beneficiary (policy donation) with over 50% of policy benefit or an amount more than HK$1 Million, a written
declaration signed by the Policyowner should be provided. 如捐贈 50% 以上保單利益或其金額超過一百萬港元予慈善團體,保單持有人必須提供
已簽署書面聲明。
9. If your application of Transfer of Policy Ownership in Part 1 of this form is not accepted by Prudential due to whatever reason, your request for beneficiary
appointment made in this part of the form will not be processed. 若保誠因任何原因未能接納閣下於此表格第一部分的保單權益轉讓申請,閣下
於此表格本部分內的委任受益人要求將不獲處理。

聯絡我們」部分所列的資料與

，
如閣下搬遷/已搬遷至歐洲聯盟(「歐盟」)司法管轄區,我們可能需要向閣下提供進一步資料,且閣下可能在歐盟《通用數據保障條例》下享有額外權
利。此類資料及此等權利均載於本公司網站上的私隱通知中。
我們會不時更新我們的私隱通知,並建議閣下瀏覽本公司網站以了解該私隱通知。該私隱通知可在本公司網站
[https://www.prudential.com.hk/scws/pages/tc/privacy-policy/index.html〕 上查閱。閣下填妥並繼續提交本表格,即表示閣下確認已閱讀並
理解本收集個人資料聲明。
業務合作夥伴指我們的服務供應商、提供行政、電信、電腦、信息技術、數據處理及儲存、客戶滿意度分析、支付、印刷、贖回或其他服務予我們,以使
我們能夠經營我們業務,會計師、審計師、IT 服務和平台供應商、保險中介機構、再保險承保人、投資經理、
代理、退休金受託人(和其他持分者)、計劃顧問、介紹人、核准的第三方金融和保險產品供應商以及我們的法
律顧問。

By ticking this box, you agree that as an international group company, in order to provide insurance-related products

Payor's Declaration 付款人聲明
I, the above-named Payor, hereby confirm and declare to Prudential that:
1. The information provided by me in this Notification Form is true, accurate and can be relied upon by Prudential; and
2. I shall bear all charges imposed both by my bank (i.e. the paying bank) and by Prudential's receiving bank to ensure that the
correct amount of insurance premium is transferred to Prudential's bank account; and
3. I understand and agree that if I fail to provide all necessary information and supporting document(s) required by this
Notification Form to Prudential within 3 months from the date of Prudential's receipt of my TT or Local TT payment, such TT or
Local TT payment will be refunded by Prudential to me net of any bank charges incurred at my expense; and
4. I have only submitted this Notification Form once and have not submitted any duplicated copies of this Notification Form and/or
supporting document(s) to Prudential; and
5. I understand and agree that Prudential reserves the right to be indemnified by me for any loss that it may suffer due to any
misrepresentation, non-disclosure, duplicated notification of TT or Local TT payment, and/or fraud or negligence committed by
me in relation to the TT or Local TT payment as described in this Notification Form .; and
6. I understand and agree that under all circumstances, Prudential shall not be responsible for any losses or costs, or any delay of
premium settlement as a result of or in connection with the use of TT or Local TT payment; and
7. I understand and accept the above Personal Information Collection Statement of Prudential.
本人,作為上述付款人,謹此向保誠作出以下聲明:
二. 本人確定上述資料為真實及準確及可被保誠信賴;及
二. 本人會承擔所有由本人的銀行(即付款銀行),以及由保誠的收款銀行徵收的費用,以確保正確數額的保費已匯款給保誠的銀行賬戶;及
=.
本人明白及同意,如果電匯或本地電匯付款已存於保誠的賬戶超過三個月,但沒有提交有效的電匯及本地電匯繳付保費通知書和所需要的資料,電
滙或本地電匯款項將退還給付款人並扣除任何銀行費用的支出;及
四.
本人證實只有提交此通知書及沒有提交任何重複的電匯及本地電匯付款通知書及/或證明文件予保誠;及
五. 本人明白及同意保誠保留向本人全數追討任何因本人在此通知書中的任何失實陳述,不披露,重複的電匯或本地電匯通知,及/或欺詐行為或疏忽而
引致之損失;及
六. 本人明白及同意在任何情況下,保誠將不會就由於使用電匯或本地電匯付款所引致或與之相關的任何損失或費用,或保費延誤而負上任何責任;及
七. 本人明白及接受上述保誠個人資料收集聲明。
Note 備註:
If the TT or Local TT payment has been left standing in Prudential's account for over 3 months and no valid TT and Local TT payment
notification form plus the required document(s) have been submitted, the TT or Local TT payment will be refunded to the Payor net of
any bank charges incurred.

還給付款人並扣除任何銀行費用的支出。

本人明白及同意,如果電匯或本地電匯付款已存於保誠的賬戶超過三個月,但沒有提交有效的電匯及本地電匯繳付保費通知書和所需要的資料,電
滙或本地電匯款項將退還給付款人並扣除任何銀行費用的支出;及
四.
本人證實只有提交此通知書及沒有提交任何重複的電匯及本地電匯付款通知書及/或證明文件予保誠;及
五. 本人明白及同意保誠保留向本人全數追討任何因本人在此通知書中的任何失實陳述,不披露,重複的電匯或本地電匯通知,及/或欺詐行為或疏忽而
引致之損失;及
六. 本人明白及同意在任何情況下,保誠將不會就由於使用電匯或本地電匯付款所引致或與之相關的任何損失或費用,或保費延誤而負上任何責任;及

DD/MM/YYYY 日/月/年

Payor 第三者付款人的地址及聯絡電話號碼
Part 2
第二部分 Payment Amount & Method 繳款金額及方法
1. HKD policies only accept HKD payment. For non-HKD policies, payments can be made in either the policy currency or HKD.If you wish to
make payment in MOP, the transaction amount will be converted into equivalent amount of HKD at the prevailing exchange rate on the
transaction date for settlement. Your payments in HKD for foreign currency policies may be subject to change in view of exchange rate
market fluctuation, and you should be aware of the exchange rate risks. You may need to pay any shortfall in the premium to maintain
your coverage without being affected if there is any discrepancy in premium due to exchange rate fluctuations. Any overpayment of
premium will be credited to the premium deposit account. Please visit prudential.com.hk/exchange-rates-mac-en for our prevailing
exchange rate in different currencies.港元保單只接受以港元付款;非港元保單接受以港元或保單貨幣付款。如 閣下希望以澳門元繳付費用,付款金額
會以交易當日之匯率兌換為等值的港元以作結算。以港元繳交外幣保單的繳款可能會因應匯率市場波動而有所變動,您應留意匯率風險。如因匯率波動而造成
繳費不足,您或需補交保費差額以維持您的保障不受影響;多繳保費將會存入至保費儲蓄戶口。請瀏覽 prudential.com.hk/exchange-rate-macs 以獲取
不同貨幣的現行匯率。
2. If payment was made by credit / debit card / telegraphic transfer and there is subsequently a refund, such refund will be directly credited
to the credit card account holder / bank account holder / remitter (as the case may be). Any handling charge or exchange rate difference
arising from such refund will be borne by credit / debit cardholder / bank account holder / remitter. 如以信用卡/借記卡/電匯繳款而其後發生
退款,該退款將直接退回予信用卡卡主/借記卡卡主/匯款人之賬戶內(視乎情況而定)。信用卡公司/發卡機構在收款及退款時徵收之手續費或使用不同匯率而產
生之外匯差額將由信用卡/借記卡卡主/匯款人承擔。
3. If the third party payment is over HKD200,000 equivalent, a copy of the identity card / passport / travel document of the Third Party
Payor must be submitted. 如第三者付款為超過 200,000 港元等值之金額,第三者付款人必須遞交身份證/護照/旅行證件之副本。
4. If the third party payment is over HKD 500,000 equivalent, a copy of the relationship proof such as marriage certificate/birth
certificate/household register must be submitted to verify the relationship between Third Party Payor and Proposer/Policyowner/Life
Proposed/Life Assured. 如第三者付款為超過 500,000 港元等值之金額,第三者付款人必須遞交關係證明文件如結婚證書/出世紙/內地戶口證明文件之副
本以核實第三者付款人與投保人/保單持有人/受保人的關係。
5. The maximum amount of cash payment that is accepted at Cashier is HKD120,000/USD15,000(or equivalent) per payment installment
per policy. 於繳費處以現金繳費,每份保單每期繳費的交易金額上限為120,000 港元/15,000 美元(或等值)。

Part 2
第二部分 Payment Amount & Method 繳款金額及方法
1. HKD policies only accept HKD payment. For non-HKD policies, payments can be made in either the policy currency or HKD.If you wish to
make payment in MOP, the transaction amount will be converted into equivalent amount of HKD at the prevailing exchange rate on the
transaction date for settlement. Your payments in HKD for foreign currency policies may be subject to change in view of exchange rate
market fluctuation, and you should be aware of the exchange rate risks. You may need to pay any shortfall in the premium to maintain
your coverage without being affected if there is any discrepancy in premium due to exchange rate fluctuations. Any overpayment of
premium will be credited to the premium deposit account. Please visit prudential.com.hk/exchange-rates-mac-en for our prevailing
exchange rate in different currencies.港元保單只接受以港元付款;非港元保單接受以港元或保單貨幣付款。如 閣下希望以澳門元繳付費用,付款金額
會以交易當日之匯率兌換為等值的港元以作結算。以港元繳交外幣保單的繳款可能會因應匯率市場波動而有所變動,您應留意匯率風險。如因匯率波動而造成
繳費不足,您或需補交保費差額以維持您的保障不受影響;多繳保費將會存入至保費儲蓄戶口。請瀏覽 prudential.com.hk/exchange-rate-macs 以獲取
不同貨幣的現行匯率。
2. If payment was made by credit / debit card / telegraphic transfer and there is subsequently a refund, such refund will be directly credited
to the credit card account holder / bank account holder / remitter (as the case may be). Any handling charge or exchange rate difference
arising from such refund will be borne by credit / debit cardholder / bank account holder / remitter. 如以信用卡/借記卡/電匯繳款而其後發生
退款,該退款將直接退回予信用卡卡主/借記卡卡主/匯款人之賬戶內(視乎情況而定)。信用卡公司/發卡機構在收款及退款時徵收之手續費或使用不同匯率而產
生之外匯差額將由信用卡/借記卡卡主/匯款人承擔。
3. If the third party payment is over HKD200,000 equivalent, a copy of the identity card / passport / travel document of the Third Party
Payor must be submitted. 如第三者付款為超過 200,000 港元等值之金額,第三者付款人必須遞交身份證/護照/旅行證件之副本。
4. If the third party payment is over HKD 500,000 equivalent, a copy of the relationship proof such as marriage certificate/birth
certificate/household register must be submitted to verify the relationship between Third Party Payor and Proposer/Policyowner/Life
Proposed/Life Assured. 如第三者付款為超過 500,000 港元等值之金額,第三者付款人必須遞交關係證明文件如結婚證書/出世紙/內地戶口證明文件之副
本以核實第三者付款人與投保人/保單持有人/受保人的關係。
5. The maximum amount of cash payment that is accepted at Cashier is HKD120,000/USD15,000(or equivalent) per payment installment
per policy. 於繳費處以現金繳費,每份保單每期繳費的交易金額上限為120,000 港元/15,000 美元(或等值)。

results.content_en:
the new Policyowner is a tax resident of Macau, the TIN is the Macau Identity Card Number.
如新保單持有人為澳門稅務居民,稅務編號是其澳門身份證號碼。
If the new Policyowner is a tax resident of China, the TIN is the China Identity Card Number.
如新保單持有人為中國稅務居民,稅務編號是其中國身份證號碼。
If the new Policyowner is a U.S. citizen, permanent resident ("Green Card" holder), or otherwise a U.S. tax resident, U.S. social security number is equivalent to TIN.
如果新保單持有人為美國公民,永久居民(“綠咭”持有人),或美國稅務居民,稅務編號是其美國社會福利保障號碼。
LAPA/DATTPM (03/22)R
5
DATTPM0105Part 7 第七部分 Revocation and Appointment of Beneficiary(ies)撤銷及委任受益人
1. Once Prudential have accepted your request for appointment of beneficiary(ies), this form will form part of the Policy. Such change will be effective from
the date when you signed this form, whether or not the Life Assured is alive at the time when we endorsed such change. All previous designation of
beneficiary(ies) and trustee(s) under the Policy shall be revoked. All death benefit thereafter shall be paid and allocated to the beneficiary(ies) and / or
trustee(s) listed below in Part 7. 有關受益人委任一經保誠接納,則會成為本保單的一部分。不論受保人當時是否在生,有關更改即於閣下
簽署此表格日期起生效。所有於較早前在本保單下委任的受益人及信託人將被取替。此後,一切身故賠償將根據此表格第七部分所列
之受益人及/或信託人作出支付及分配。
2. The total share for each group of beneficiary(ies) must be 100% (to share equally according to Prudential's guideline unless otherwise stated). H / f /
獲分配的百分比總和必須為100%(如沒有特別聲明,賠償則會按保誠的守則平均分配)
。
3. To appoint secondary beneficiary, primary beneficiary must be appointed in advance. The designation of secondary beneficiary(ies) will only be effective if all
primary beneficiaries are deceased. 如需委任候補受益人,必須先委任基本受益人。候補受益人的委任必須於所有基本受益人身故後方才生效。
4. If the beneficiary is NOT an immediate family member (including spouse, parent, children, siblings, or grandparent) of the life assured, it is a MUST to provide
identity document / passport number of the beneficiary in this form. 如受益人並非受保人之直系親屬(包括配偶 /父母/ 子女/ 兄弟姊妹 /
祖父母),必須於此表格提供受益人之身份證/護照號碼。
5. Financial Consultant cannot be the beneficiary, unless she / he is the immediate family member of life assured. 理財顧問如非受保人的直系親屬,不得
成為受益人。
6. There is no restriction on the age of beneficiary(ies), but payment of benefit to any minors shall be subject to the provisions of the Policy (if applicable).
受益人的年齡不受限制,但向未成年人士支付的利益將受本保單的條款限制(如適用)。
7. If the intended beneficiary is a business entity / trust fund / trust company, it is required to submit along with this form (i) Business Registration number of
the party concerned; and (ii) a copy of Business Registration Certificate or Certificate of Incorporation; and (iii) a copy of latest Annual Return. $02 1FA'S
受益人為一商業實體/信託基金/信託公司,必須連同此表格一併遞交(i)其商業登記號碼,及(i)商業登記證或公司註冊證明書之副本及
(ii) 最新的周年申報表之副本。
8. To name a Charitable Institution as the Beneficiary (policy donation) with over 50% of policy benefit or an amount more than HK$1 Million, a written
declaration signed by the Policyowner should be provided. 如捐贈 50% 以上保單利益或其金額超過一百萬港元予慈善團體,保單持有人必須提供
已簽署書面聲明。
9. If your application of Transfer of Policy Ownership in Part 1 of this form is not accepted by Prudential due to whatever reason, your request for beneficiary
appointment made in this part of the form will not be processed. 若保誠因任何原因未能接納閣下於此表格第一部分的保單權益轉讓申請,閣下
於此表格本部分內的委任受益人要求將不獲處理。

the date when you signed this form, whether or not the Life Assured is alive at the time when we endorsed such change. All previous designation of
beneficiary(ies) and trustee(s) under the Policy shall be revoked. All death benefit thereafter shall be paid and allocated to the beneficiary(ies) and / or
trustee(s) listed below in Part 7. 有關受益人委任一經保誠接納,則會成為本保單的一部分。不論受保人當時是否在生,有關更改即於閣下
簽署此表格日期起生效。所有於較早前在本保單下委任的受益人及信託人將被取替。此後,一切身故賠償將根據此表格第七部分所列
之受益人及/或信託人作出支付及分配。
2. The total share for each group of beneficiary(ies) must be 100% (to share equally according to Prudential's guideline unless otherwise stated). H / f /
獲分配的百分比總和必須為100%(如沒有特別聲明,賠償則會按保誠的守則平均分配)
。
3. To appoint secondary beneficiary, primary beneficiary must be appointed in advance. The designation of secondary beneficiary(ies) will only be effective if all
primary beneficiaries are deceased. 如需委任候補受益人,必須先委任基本受益人。候補受益人的委任必須於所有基本受益人身故後方才生效。
4. If the beneficiary is NOT an immediate family member (including spouse, parent, children, siblings, or grandparent) of the life assured, it is a MUST to provide
identity document / passport number of the beneficiary in this form. 如受益人並非受保人之直系親屬(包括配偶 /父母/ 子女/ 兄弟姊妹 /
祖父母),必須於此表格提供受益人之身份證/護照號碼。
5. Financial Consultant cannot be the beneficiary, unless she / he is the immediate family member of life assured. 理財顧問如非受保人的直系親屬,不得
成為受益人。
6. There is no restriction on the age of beneficiary(ies), but payment of benefit to any minors shall be subject to the provisions of the Policy (if applicable).
受益人的年齡不受限制,但向未成年人士支付的利益將受本保單的條款限制(如適用)。
7. If the intended beneficiary is a business entity / trust fund / trust company, it is required to submit along with this form (i) Business Registration number of
the party concerned; and (ii) a copy of Business Registration Certificate or Certificate of Incorporation; and (iii) a copy of latest Annual Return. $02 1FA'S
受益人為一商業實體/信託基金/信託公司,必須連同此表格一併遞交(i)其商業登記號碼,及(i)商業登記證或公司註冊證明書之副本及
(ii) 最新的周年申報表之副本。
8. To name a Charitable Institution as the Beneficiary (policy donation) with over 50% of policy benefit or an amount more than HK$1 Million, a written
declaration signed by the Policyowner should be provided. 如捐贈 50% 以上保單利益或其金額超過一百萬港元予慈善團體,保單持有人必須提供
已簽署書面聲明。
9. If your application of Transfer of Policy Ownership in Part 1 of this form is not accepted by Prudential due to whatever reason, your request for beneficiary
appointment made in this part of the form will not be processed. 若保誠因任何原因未能接納閣下於此表格第一部分的保單權益轉讓申請,閣下
於此表格本部分內的委任受益人要求將不獲處理。

results.title_name_en: Trustee Service with BOCT
results.title_name_tc: 交銀信託提供之保單信託服務
results.content_en:
st application with Bank of Communications Trustee (thereafter
shortened as "BOCT")
b) Obtain confirmation with BOCT by issuing Trust Deeds, usually around 3 -4
weeks.
c) Agents will be notified by BOCT and should prepare the policy change form,
i.e. Beneficiary Appointment Form with Policyowner's signature to
Prudential accordingly, pending attachments as specified in item 3 below. The
workflow shall follow the existing practice as set forth by Life Administration.
Version: Dec 12, 2007 (Final)d) The required documents (see item 3 below) will be submitted by BOCT to Life
Administration and the Company reserves the right to call for additional
documents for incomplete cases.
e) Upon completion, Company will issue confirmation notices to the Policyowner
(with cc copy to agent).
f) Future correspondence will be sent to original Policyowner subsequent to the
confirmation as usual (as there is no change in policy ownership).
2. Minimum Requirement for setting up policy trust with BOCT
- By Sum Insured: Not less than HK$3 Million (including policy issued with
Prudential and other companies)
- By Assets: Not less than HK$3 Million (including cash value of policy and other
tangibles assets and properties)
- Discretion will be exercised by Bank of Communication Trustee if the above
amount is not met.
- Applying the usual practice of excluding US citizens from the purchase of
investment linked plan, the same restriction will be applied to the discretionary
beneficiaries as set out in the Trust, plus the exclusion for Japanese citizens for all
plans.
3. Documents required for submission to Life Administration
(in accordance with the best practice laid down in the guidance notes of OCI)
- Trust Deed containing Settlor name and beneficiaries name in full
- Relationship declaration of the beneficiaries as contained in the Trust Application
Form or any other supplementary sheet
- Nationality of the Settlor and the beneficiaries (US citizenship will be excluded
for linked policies, Japanese citizenship for all policies, see item 2 above)
4. Responsibilities
4.1 Agent's role
- Agent shall act a referrer and should play no active role in the trust application.
Agents are strongly advised not to give advice on the type of trust and the
consequence, and shall from time to time, refer the client to consult sales staff
from BOCT or their own lawyer if in doubt.
- Agent has NO obligation to sign as witness during the trust application.
- Agent can decide on his own whether to join the sales meeting with the service
provider or not.
- Agent has NO commission from Bank of Communication Trustee in any
Version: Dec 12, 2007 (Final)

results.content_en:
PRUDENTIAL

Application Form for Automatic Premium Loan Option
自動保費貸款選項申請表
Automatic Premium Loan Option
自動保費貸款選項
Declaration
聲明
I request to apply Automatic Premium Loan clause to the policy which the amount of premium or premium and levy shall be automatically
deemed to be paid by a premium loan and extend to the premium(s) or premium(s) and levy(ies) for any supplementary benefit(s) when the
Plan is paid up.
本人申請應用自動保費貸款條文於此保單,即保費或保費及徵費將自動以貸款的形式繳交,並延續條文於本計劃已繳清所有保費時的附加保障之保費
或保費及徵費。
I declare that I have read and confirm understanding of the important notes below.
本人在此聲明本人已閱讀並確認明白下列注意事項之內容。
Important Notes
注意事項
1. We shall charge you interest on the Automatic Premium Loan(s) starting from the date when the respective Automatic Premium Loan(s)
is incurred. We shall determine the interest rate charged on the Automatic Premium Loan(s).
本公司將會由自動保費貸款日期開始收取自動保費貸款的利息,有關利率將由本公司釐訂。
2. The policy will be automatically terminated once the total outstanding loan amount (including interest) owing to us under your policy
exceeds stated percentage on Policy Contract of the guaranteed cash value of your policy minus all Advanced Claims being paid and / or
payable of this Plan.
本計劃將在 閣下的保單所欠本公司之未償還總金額(包括利息)超過合約訂明比率之保單保證現金價值扣除於本計劃須支付及/或已付訖的預
支賠償總額時立即終止。
I/We declare that I/we have read and confirm understanding of the above content.
本人/吾等在此聲明本人/吾等已閱讀並確認明白上述之內容。

蓋印或指紋簽署,必須有兩位見證人。見證人之個人資料只會用於處理本申請及確認此表格簽署人的身份之用。

LAPA/DATTPM (03/22)R
9
DATTPM0109Part X 第十部 Policy Replacement Declaration 轉保聲明
In order to subsidize the purchase of your new life insurance policy, are you using, or do you intend to use the funds arising from the existing life insurance
policy (or multiple life insurance policies) (collectively "existing life insurance policy(ies)") that you have or had, or any savings made by reducing the premium
payable under your existing life insurance policy in the past or next 12 months, by means of the followings:
閣下是否打算在未來緊接的十二個月內,或已經在過去的十二個月內,使用或打算使用 閣下現時或曾經持有的一張或多張人壽保單
(下稱“現有人壽保單”)透過下列方式取得資金或節省保費,以資助購買新人壽保單所需的費用?
1. Reducing the total cash value, sum assured, other policy value(s) or policy right(s) of the existing life insurance policy(ies), by exercising the policy right
under the existing life insurance policy(ies) (including wholly or partially withdrawal, wholly or partially surrender);
2. Taking out a policy loan from the existing life insurance policy (ies);
3. Reducing, suspending or non-payment of premium under the existing life insurance policy(ies), including switching to reduced paid-up or extended term
insurance by automatic operation of the terms and conditions, exercising automatic premium loan, premium holiday or lapsation, etc .; or
4. Transferring or assigning ownership of existing life insurance policy(ies).
1. 行使現有人壽保單內之權利,包括提取全部或部份保單款項、退保或部份退保等,以減少現有人壽保單的現金價值總額、保險金額、
其他保單價值或保單權益;
2. 從現有人壽保單中提取保單貸款;

業務合作夥伴指我們的服務供應商、提供行政、電信、電腦、信息技術、數據處理及儲存、客戶滿意度分析、支付、印刷、贖回或其他服務予我們,以使
我們能夠經營我們業務,會計師、審計師、IT 服務和平台供應商、保險中介機構、再保險承保人、投資經理、

Are you currently a customer in mainland China? 您現在是否是個中國內地客戶?
Yes 是

process your request / application. 如「是」,請勾選以下選項以同意下列聲明。如您不同意以下聲明,我們可能無法處理您的指示/申請。)
By ticking this box, you agree that as an international group company, in order to provide insurance-related products
or services, we may need to store and process your personal information outside of mainland China. Please refer to
our Privacy Notice (https://www.prudential.com.hk/en/china-personal-information-protection-law/) for more
information.
勾選此項,表示您同意,我們作為國際集團公司,為提供保險相關產品或服務,可能需要在中國內地境外存儲或處理您的個人信息。更多
資訊,請參閱我們的隱私聲明(https://www.prudential.com.hk/tc/china-personal-information-protection-law/)。

Payor's Declaration 付款人聲明
I, the above-named Payor, hereby confirm and declare to Prudential that:
1. The information provided by me in this Notification Form is true, accurate and can be relied upon by Prudential; and
2. I shall bear all charges imposed both by my bank (i.e. the paying bank) and by Prudential's receiving bank to ensure that the
correct amount of insurance premium is transferred to Prudential's bank account; and
3. I understand and agree that if I fail to provide all necessary information and supporting document(s) required by this
Notification Form to Prudential within 3 months from the date of Prudential's receipt of my TT or Local TT payment, such TT or
Local TT payment will be refunded by Prudential to me net of any bank charges incurred at my expense; and
4. I have only submitted this Notification Form once and have not submitted any duplicated copies of this Notification Form and/or
supporting document(s) to Prudential; and
5. I understand and agree that Prudential reserves the right to be indemnified by me for any loss that it may suffer due to any
misrepresentation, non-disclosure, duplicated notification of TT or Local TT payment, and/or fraud or negligence committed by
me in relation to the TT or Local TT payment as described in this Notification Form .; and
6. I understand and agree that under all circumstances, Prudential shall not be responsible for any losses or costs, or any delay of
premium settlement as a result of or in connection with the use of TT or Local TT payment; and
7. I understand and accept the above Personal Information Collection Statement of Prudential.
本人,作為上述付款人,謹此向保誠作出以下聲明:
二. 本人確定上述資料為真實及準確及可被保誠信賴;及
二. 本人會承擔所有由本人的銀行(即付款銀行),以及由保誠的收款銀行徵收的費用,以確保正確數額的保費已匯款給保誠的銀行賬戶;及
=.
本人明白及同意,如果電匯或本地電匯付款已存於保誠的賬戶超過三個月,但沒有提交有效的電匯及本地電匯繳付保費通知書和所需要的資料,電
滙或本地電匯款項將退還給付款人並扣除任何銀行費用的支出;及
四.
本人證實只有提交此通知書及沒有提交任何重複的電匯及本地電匯付款通知書及/或證明文件予保誠;及
五. 本人明白及同意保誠保留向本人全數追討任何因本人在此通知書中的任何失實陳述,不披露,重複的電匯或本地電匯通知,及/或欺詐行為或疏忽而
引致之損失;及
六. 本人明白及同意在任何情況下,保誠將不會就由於使用電匯或本地電匯付款所引致或與之相關的任何損失或費用,或保費延誤而負上任何責任;及
七. 本人明白及接受上述保誠個人資料收集聲明。
Note 備註:
If the TT or Local TT payment has been left standing in Prudential's account for over 3 months and no valid TT and Local TT payment
notification form plus the required document(s) have been submitted, the TT or Local TT payment will be refunded to the Payor net of
any bank charges incurred.

營銷合作夥伴指我們的服務供應商提供行政、電信、電腦、支付、印刷、第三方獎賞/會員/優惠計劃、醫療/健康/保健相關產品、贖回或其他服務,以使
我們能夠經營我們業務、保險中介、退休金受託人(和其他持分者)、計劃顧問、介紹人和核准的第三方金融和保險產品供應商。
Are you currently a customer in mainland China? 您現在是否是個中國內地客戶?
Yes 是
(If "Yes", please tick below box to agree the following statement. If you disagree with this statement, we may not be able to
process your request / application. 如「是」,請勾選以下選項以同意下列聲明。如您不同意以下聲明,我們可能無法處理您的指示/申請。)
By ticking this box, you agree that as an international group company, in order to provide insurance-related products
or services, we may need to store and process your personal information outside of mainland China. Please refer to
our Privacy Notice (https://www.prudential.com.hk/en/china-personal-information-protection-law/) for more
information.
勾選此項,表示您同意,我們作為國際集團公司,為提供保險相關產品或服務,可能需要在中國內地境外存儲或處理您的個人信息。更多
資訊,請參閱我們的隱私聲明(https://www.prudential.com.hk/tc/china-personal-information-protection-law/)。
No 否
Payor's Declaration 付款人聲明
I, the above-named Payor, hereby confirm and declare to Prudential that:
1. The information provided by me in this Notification Form is true, accurate and can be relied upon by Prudential; and
2. I shall bear all charges imposed both by my bank (i.e. the paying bank) and by Prudential's receiving bank to ensure that the
correct amount of insurance premium is transferred to Prudential's bank account; and
3. I understand and agree that if I fail to provide all necessary information and supporting document(s) required by this
Notification Form to Prudential within 3 months from the date of Prudential's receipt of my TT or Local TT payment, such TT or
Local TT payment will be refunded by Prudential to me net of any bank charges incurred at my expense; and
4. I have only submitted this Notification Form once and have not submitted any duplicated copies of this Notification Form and/or
supporting document(s) to Prudential; and
5. I understand and agree that Prudential reserves the right to be indemnified by me for any loss that it may suffer due to any
misrepresentation, non-disclosure, duplicated notification of TT or Local TT payment, and/or fraud or negligence committed by
me in relation to the TT or Local TT payment as described in this Notification Form .; and
6. I understand and agree that under all circumstances, Prudential shall not be responsible for any losses or costs, or any delay of
premium settlement as a result of or in connection with the use of TT or Local TT payment; and
7. I understand and accept the above Personal Information Collection Statement of Prudential.
本人,作為上述付款人,謹此向保誠作出以下聲明:
二. 本人確定上述資料為真實及準確及可被保誠信賴;及
二. 本人會承擔所有由本人的銀行(即付款銀行),以及由保誠的收款銀行徵收的費用,以確保正確數額的保費已匯款給保誠的銀行賬戶;及
=.
本人明白及同意,如果電匯或本地電匯付款已存於保誠的賬戶超過三個月,但沒有提交有效的電匯及本地電匯繳付保費通知書和所需要的資料,電
滙或本地電匯款項將退還給付款人並扣除任何銀行費用的支出;及
四.
本人證實只有提交此通知書及沒有提交任何重複的電匯及本地電匯付款通知書及/或證明文件予保誠;及
五. 本人明白及同意保誠保留向本人全數追討任何因本人在此通知書中的任何失實陳述,不披露,重複的電匯或本地電匯通知,及/或欺詐行為或疏忽而
引致之損失;及
六. 本人明白及同意在任何情況下,保誠將不會就由於使用電匯或本地電匯付款所引致或與之相關的任何損失或費用,或保費延誤而負上任何責任;及
七. 本人明白及接受上述保誠個人資料收集聲明。
Note 備註:
If the TT or Local TT payment has been left standing in Prudential's account for over 3 months and no valid TT and Local TT payment
notification form plus the required document(s) have been submitted, the TT or Local TT payment will be refunded to the Payor net of
any bank charges incurred.
如果電匯或本地電匯付款已存於保誠的賬戶超 過三個月,但沒有提交有效的電匯及本地電匯繳付保費通知書和所需要的資料,電匯或本地電匯款項將退
還給付款人並扣除任何銀行費用的支出。

results.content_en:
繳費辦法 Payment Instructions
請使用下列辦法直接繳付費用。港元保單只接受港元/澳門元付款。外幣保單可接受以保單貨幣或港元/澳門元付款。非港元保單之付款貨幣受個別繳費方法之條款及細則所規限。
請參閱各繳費方法可接受的付款貨幣。若 閣下以港元/澳門元支付外幣保單及以非支票方式付款,交易金額將按交易日適用的匯率折算為保單貨幣等值金額結算。若 閣下以港元
支票付款,將按保誠收到支票當日的適用匯率換算成保單貨幣的等值金額結算。請瀏覽prudential.com.hk/exchange-rates-mac以獲取不同貨幣的現行匯率。為保障 閣下的利益,
繳付費用時, 閣下不應該將現金轉交或轉賬至 閣下的理財顧問。與此同時,請參閱本公司網頁所刊登之私隱政策。
Please make payments to us directly using the payment methods listed below. For HKD policies, payments can only be made in HKD/MOP. For policies denominated in foreign currencies, payments
can be made in either the policy currency or HKD/MOP. The payment currency of non-HKD policies is subject to the terms and conditions of the individual payment methods. Please refer to the
acceptable payment currencies for each payment method. If you pay for a foreign currency policy in HKD/MOP by non-cheque payment, the transaction amount will be settled at the applicable
exchange rate on the transaction date and converted into the equivalent amount of policy currency. If you pay by cheque in HKD, the transaction amount will be settled at the applicable exchange
rate at on the day of receipt by Prudential and converted into the equivalent amount of policy currency. Please visit prudential.com.hk/exchange-rates-mac-en for our prevailing exchange rate in
different currencies. To protect your interest, you should not pass cash or transfer funds to your financial consultant when making payment. In addition, please visit our privacy policy published in our
corporate website.
3 自動轉賬 Autopay^
閣下可以設立銀行戶口自動轉賬或更改
自動轉賬戶口繳費。請
● 聯絡 閣下之理財顧問或
● 於 www.prudential.com.mo
(澳門>下載中心>更改保單付款
資料)下載的銀行戶口直接付款授權
書(澳門適用)
由於設立自動轉賬需時21天,請將授權
書及預繳保費的支票郵寄至本公司辦理
相關手續(地址:澳門郵政總局郵政信
箱3093號)。
You can set up a bank account autopay or change
autopay account to settle payment. Please
· contact your financial consultant or
· visit www.prudential.com.mo
(Macau > Download library > Update of
Policy Payment Details) for downloading
appropriate Bank Account Direct Debit
Authorization Form (for Macau).
As it takes 21 days to set up the direct debit
authorization, please send the form and the
cheque for advanced payment to us by mail for
processing (Address: P.O. Box 3093, General Post
Office, Macau).
$
電滙 Telegraphic Transfer
您可以使用電匯以保單貨幣 ** 匯款至 You may pay premium by telegraphic transfer
相應貨幣的銀行戶口繳交保費。請預 in policy currency ** to the bank account in
留至少七個工作天以處理有關款項。 the corresponding currency. Please allow
詳情請聯絡 閣下的理財顧問或前往 at least seven working days for processing
pruhk.co/payment-mac-tt °
the premium payment. For details, please
contact your financial consultant or visit
pruhk.co/payment-mac-tt-en.
?其他繳款辦法 Other Payment Instructions
請瀏覽 www.prudential.com.mo 以了解詳情。
Please visit www.prudential.com.mo for details.
親臨繳費處付款 Payment in person at cashier # ▲
閣下可攜同繳費通知書前往本公司之繳費 You can bring along the Premium Notice and
處以下列方法付款。
make payment at our cashier using one of the
following methods.
現金
每份保單每期繳費的交易金額上限為
120,000港元/123,700澳門元/15,000美元
或等值。為保障您的利益,繳付費用時,
您不應該將現金轉交或轉賬至您的理財顧
問。如您欲以現金繳費,建議親臨本公司
繳費處直接辦理。
Cash
Maximum HKD 120,000 / MOP 123,700 /
USD 15,000 or equivalent per payment
installment per policy. To protect your interest,
you should not pass cash or transfer funds
to your financial consultant when making
payment. If you prefer to pay in cash, you
should pay directly at our cashier.
劃線支票/銀行本票/匯票 **
只接受澳門本地銀行發出的港元*劃線支
票/銀行本票/匯票繳費,抬頭請寫上「保
誠保險有限公司」。如閣下於過去12個
月曾使用銀行本票/匯票支付保費及累計
金額超過120,000港元或以上,須付上相
關的資金來源證明文件。有關資金來源証
明文件的詳情,請聯絡您的理財顧問或致
電客戶服務熱線。保誠保留權利以要求客
戶提供有關證明文件。
Crossed cheque/cashier order/bank draft **
Only accept HKD* crossed Cheque/cashier
order/bank draft issued by banks in Macau
made payable to "Prudential Hong Kong
Limited". If you have paid premium by cashier
order/bank draft in the past 12 months and the
total amount exceeds HKD 120,000 or above,
relevant supporting documents for the source
of funds must be provided. Please contact your
financial consultant or call our customer service
hotline for details of the supporting documents.
Prudential reserves the right to request for the
related supporting documents from customers.
信用卡/銀聯卡
請注意,本公司不接受以信用卡/銀聯卡繳
付「續保保費」、「保單更改」、「償還
貸款」及「在保單保費儲蓄戶口的預繳保
費」。
Credit Card/UnionPay Card
Please note that we do not accept payment
by credit card for "Renewal Premium", "Policy
Change", "Loan Repayment" and "Advance
Premium into Premium Deposit Account
(PDA)".
保誠可能隨時更改繳費安排而毋須事先通知。詳情請瀏覽本公司網頁。
Prudential may change payment arrangement anytime without prior notice. For details,
please visit our corporate website.
註 Note:
*
請預留三個工作天予本公司處理有關付款。Please allow 3 working days for payment processing.
** 付款貨幣受個別計劃之條款及細則所規限。Currency for payment is subject to the terms and conditions of individual product.
# 恕不接受以海外支票/銀行本票/匯票繳費。Making payment via overseas cheque/cashier's order/bank draft is not accepted.
▲ 由第三者付款的繳費方式恕不獲接受,除非付款人為保單持有人之直系親屬或指定人士類別,並連同付款人及保單持有人所簽署的「第三者付款聲明書」一併提交。如第
三者款項超過指定金額,第三者付款人必須遞交相關的證明文件。Payment by a third party is not accepted unless the payor is an immediate family member of the policyowner or
person(s) in the specified categories, and the payment is submitted together with a "Third Party Payment Declaration Form" signed by both the payor and the policyowner. If the third party
payment is over designated amount, the payor has to submit the related supporting documents.
(10 / 2024)

8. Kindly note that the list prepared under Point 1 above only contains (i) inforce
policies and (ii) policies that have been expired for 2 months or less (counting from
the date of policy termination to the date of downline's leaving).
9. Even though the upline is given 14 working days to reply us for the assignment,
when the policy/policies concerned has/have to be renewed very soon for
collecting premium via DDA/Credit Card account on a particular date, this/thesepolicy/policies shall be renewed immediately and assigned to the upline
automatically. As such, he/she shall be the newly assigned agent.
10. Not all policy/policies served by the leaving downline shall be assigned as per
points above (for instance, policies having been expired for more than 2 months).
Should there be any query or issue in relation to this/these policy/policies
subsequently, the upline of the leaving downline shall be contacted and appointed
to handle this query/issue. No objection or further assignment shall be
entertained.

Points to Note for PGHK Agent Assignment Rule
- The client has to fill in the designated application form for changing financial
consultant(s) of his/her policy/policies.
- Only the client (who must be the policyholder) has the right to request changing of
financial consultant(s) for his/her policy/policies. Request raised by the insured
person/employee (other than the policyholder) or the beneficiary of the
policy/policies concerned shall not be accepted.
- Should the policy/policies concerned is/are insured on a joint-named basis, all
policyholders have to sign on the application form for request changing of financial
consultants for their policy/policies.
- This Guideline is applicable for GI/EB policies including General Insurance, Group
Medical and Group Life, but not MPF.
results.content_tc:
for
queries/policy services.
8. Kindly note that the list prepared under Point 1 above only contains (i) inforce
policies and (ii) policies that have been expired for 2 months or less (counting from
the date of policy termination to the date of downline's leaving).
9. Even though the upline is given 14 working days to reply us for the assignment,
when the policy/policies concerned has/have to be renewed very soon for
collecting premium via DDA/Credit Card account on a particular date, this/thesepolicy/policies shall be renewed immediately and assigned to the upline
automatically. As such, he/she shall be the newly assigned agent.
10. Not all policy/policies served by the leaving downline shall be assigned as per
points above (for instance, policies having been expired for more than 2 months).
Should there be any query or issue in relation to this/these policy/policies
subsequently, the upline of the leaving downline shall be contacted and appointed
to handle this query/issue. No objection or further assignment shall be
entertained.

Points to Note for PGHK Agent Assignment Rule
- The client has to fill in the designated application form for changing financial
consultant(s) of his/her policy/policies.
- Only the client (who must be the policyholder) has the right to request changing of
financial consultant(s) for his/her policy/policies. Request raised by the insured
person/employee (other than the policyholder) or the beneficiary of the
policy/policies concerned shall not be accepted.
- Should the policy/policies concerned is/are insured on a joint-named basis, all
policyholders have to sign on the application form for request changing of financial
consultants for their policy/policies.
- This Guideline is applicable for GI/EB policies including General Insurance, Group
Medical and Group Life, but not MPF.

PRUDENTIAL

Important Notes 重要提示:
1. Please complete in BLOCK LETTERS. 請以正楷填寫。
2. Please return to Prudential Hong Kong Limited (Macau Branch) ("Prudential") within 30 days after signing this form. 請於簽署此表格後30天內交回保誠
保險有限公司(澳門分行)
(「保誠」)處理。
3. Please do not sign on blank or incomplete form. 請勿在空白表格或尚未填妥的表格上簽署。
4. Any changes or amendments in this form must be countersigned by the Policyowner in full signature. 保單持有人必須在此表格內任何更改或修改的
地方簽署作實。
5. Policyowner MUST sign and date in Part 4 of this form. 保單持有人必須在此表格第四部分簽署及填寫簽署日期。
6. Please pay 2 premium installment in advance as it takes 45 days for the Direct Debit Authorization to set up. 設立直接付款授權需時45天,請預付2期保費。
7. Upon completion of this Direct Debit Authorization set up request, the payment method will be defaulted to autopay via bank account, and the existing autopay
arrangement, if any, will be stopped immediately. 完成設立直接付款授權申請後,保單之繳費方法將自動設定為銀行戶口自動轉賬,而原有的
自動轉賬設定(如有)會即時終止。
8. Please complete the form in appropriate position as instructed, any information written in non-designated blank spaces will not be processed. S R # Itt
表格之指示於適當的位置填寫資料,於其他非指定空白位置填寫的資料恕不受理。
9. Prudential shall have the right to reject this form if you fail to fulfil Prudential's requirements. 若閣下未能符合保誠的有關規定,保誠有權拒絕此
表格。
10. Receipt of this form by Financial Consultants does not constitute receipt by Prudential. 理財顧問收到此表格並不代表保誠亦已收到。
11. In any circumstances, a person who is not a party to the above policy (including but not limited to the Life Assured or the Beneficiary) has no right to enforce
any of the terms of the above policy. 任何不是上述保單某一方的人士或實體(包括但不限於受保人或受益人),在任何情況下均不能強制
執行上述保單的任何條款。
Part 1a 第一部分 甲部 Direct Debit Authorization and Declaration 直接付款授權和聲明
I/ We hereby authorize Bank of China Macau Branch / Bank of China (Macau) (hereinafter referred to as "the Bank") to effect transfers from my/ our account
specified below to the account of Prudential Hong Kong Limited (Macau Branch) ("Prudential"), details of which specified below, such sum of sums as Prudential
may from time to time advise the Bank. This authorization shall remain valid until further notice.
I/ We further agree that:
本人/吾等茲授權中國銀行澳門分行/中國銀行(澳門)(以下簡稱 貴銀行),根據保誠保險有限公司(澳門分行)(「保誠」)不時給予
貴銀行之指示,在本人/吾等於 貴銀行開立之賬戶(賬戶號碼附誌如下)內支取款項,轉賬予保誠之賬戶以繳付有關費用,直至另行書
面通知為止。本人/吾等知悉遵守下述條款辦理:
1. The Bank may effect transfers from my/our said account such sum or sums as advised by Prudential at any time with immediate effect. $R 1T ## F1 ( apt Ég
付款通知即可支付,款項按保誠所提供之金額扣除。
2. Under no circumstances shall the Bank be held responsible for any consequence(s) as a result of unsuccessful transfer of fund(s) from my/our said account.
如該賬款未能自本人/吾等之銀行賬戶內支付,一切責任及後果,概與 貴銀行無涉。
3. Any variation or cancellation of this authorization has to be given by notice in writing. This authorization shall remain valid unless such notice is given to and
received by the Bank. For 6 consecutive times, transfers are not effected due to no sufficient available fund in my/our said account, the Bank may at its own
discretion not to comply with or act further with this authorization without notice to me/us. 如有任何令授權書失效之變更,本人/吾等必須書面
通知 貴銀行。貴銀行在收到書面通知前,本授權書繼續有效。但如本人/吾等之銀行賬戶達續六次因賬戶可用餘額不足而未能支付
賬款,則貴銀行可有權不經通知而撤銷此項授權。
4. Service charge of the Bank will be debited from my/our said account. 貴銀行有權徵收服務費用,並可由本人/吾等之銀行賬戶內支付。
5. The Bank may disclose details of my/our said account to any other third party if the Bank finds it necessary and appropriate. 貴銀行認為必要和適當時,
不必通知或取得本人/吾等同意有權將有關的賬戶資料披露給其他機構。
6. The Bank shall be entitled to convert the sum or sums to be transferred to the account of Prudential into HKD at a rate determined by the Bank. If the
policy currency is HKD, the premium will be settled in HKD directly. If the policy currency is in USD, the HKD amount will be converted to USD for settlement.
本人/ 吾等授權 貴銀行可根據自動扣賬當天 貴銀行所指定的匯率將轉賬款項兌換成港元以轉賬予保誠之帳戶。如保單貨幣為港元,
保費會直接以港元結算。如保單貨幣為美元,有關港元金額會兌換為美元以作結算。
7. The Bank shall not be obliged to ascertain whether or not notice of any such transfer has been given to me/us. 本人 / 吾等同意 貴銀行無義務確定該等
支款通知是否已交予本人/吾等。
8. Full responsibility for any overdraft (or increase in existing overdraft) on my/our account which may arise as a result of any such transfer(s) shall be jointly
and severally accepted by me/us. 本人 / 吾等願共同及各別承擔因該等支款而令本人/吾等之銀行賬戶出現透支(或令現時透支增加)之
全部責任。
Prudential Hong Kong Limited (Macau Branch) 保誠保險有限公司(澳門分行)
Part of Prudential plc (United Kingdom) 保誠集團成員

results.content_en:
Third Party Payment Declaration Form
第三者付款聲明書
MACAU
PRUDENTIAL
保 誠 保 險
Please tick the appropriate box. 請在適當方格內填上√號。 * Please delete where appropriate. 請刪去不適用者。
Part 1 第一部分 Personal & Policy Details 個人及保單資料
Proposal / Policy No. 投保書/保單號碼
Billing No. 繳費編號

and *Proposer / Policyowner / Life

人的關係
Note 備註:
For third party payments, only
payments by person(s) in the specified
categories will be accepted. 就第三者付
款而言,只接受由指定類別人士之付款。
Spouse 配偶

(#Please provide supporting document. 請提供證明文件。)
Company solely/partially owned by the *Proposer/Policyowner/Life Proposed/Life
Assured or their spouse, parents or children *投保人/保單持有人/受保人或其配偶、父母、
子女完全/部分持有之公司 (Please provide (i) a copy of Business Registration Certificate or
Certificate of Incorporation and (ii) a copy of latest Annual Return. For partially owned
company, please also provide supporting document with consent from the directors or
shareholders (as applicable) (e.g. board minutes). 請提供(i)商業登記證或公司註冊證明書之副本
及(ii)最新周年申報表之副本。如為部分持有之公司,須同時提供取得董事會或股東(如適用)同意的證
明文件(如董事會議紀錄)。)
Reason of paying by a company that
the *Proposer/Policyowner/Life
Proposed/Life Assured or their spouse,
parents or children owns the company
less than 50% shareholding 付款由*投
保人/保單持有人/受保人或其配偶、父母、
子女持股少於50%的公司支付的原因
*Identity Card / Passport / Travel
Document No. of Third Party Payor
第三者付款人的*身份證/護照/旅行證件號碼
Gender 性別
Male 男
Female 女
Nationality of Third Party Payor
第三者付款人的國籍
Date of Birth of Third Party
Payor 第三者付款人的出生日期
DD/MM/YYYY 日/月/年
Address & Contact No. of Third Party
Payor 第三者付款人的地址及聯絡電話號碼
Part 2
第二部分 Payment Amount & Method 繳款金額及方法
1. HKD policies only accept HKD payment. For non-HKD policies, payments can be made in either the policy currency or HKD.If you wish to
make payment in MOP, the transaction amount will be converted into equivalent amount of HKD at the prevailing exchange rate on the
transaction date for settlement. Your payments in HKD for foreign currency policies may be subject to change in view of exchange rate
market fluctuation, and you should be aware of the exchange rate risks. You may need to pay any shortfall in the premium to maintain
your coverage without being affected if there is any discrepancy in premium due to exchange rate fluctuations. Any overpayment of
premium will be credited to the premium deposit account. Please visit prudential.com.hk/exchange-rates-mac-en for our prevailing
exchange rate in different currencies.港元保單只接受以港元付款;非港元保單接受以港元或保單貨幣付款。如 閣下希望以澳門元繳付費用,付款金額
會以交易當日之匯率兌換為等值的港元以作結算。以港元繳交外幣保單的繳款可能會因應匯率市場波動而有所變動,您應留意匯率風險。如因匯率波動而造成
繳費不足,您或需補交保費差額以維持您的保障不受影響;多繳保費將會存入至保費儲蓄戶口。請瀏覽 prudential.com.hk/exchange-rate-macs 以獲取
不同貨幣的現行匯率。
2. If payment was made by credit / debit card / telegraphic transfer and there is subsequently a refund, such refund will be directly credited
to the credit card account holder / bank account holder / remitter (as the case may be). Any handling charge or exchange rate difference
arising from such refund will be borne by credit / debit cardholder / bank account holder / remitter. 如以信用卡/借記卡/電匯繳款而其後發生
退款,該退款將直接退回予信用卡卡主/借記卡卡主/匯款人之賬戶內(視乎情況而定)。信用卡公司/發卡機構在收款及退款時徵收之手續費或使用不同匯率而產
生之外匯差額將由信用卡/借記卡卡主/匯款人承擔。
3. If the third party payment is over HKD200,000 equivalent, a copy of the identity card / passport / travel document of the Third Party
Payor must be submitted. 如第三者付款為超過 200,000 港元等值之金額,第三者付款人必須遞交身份證/護照/旅行證件之副本。
4. If the third party payment is over HKD 500,000 equivalent, a copy of the relationship proof such as marriage certificate/birth
certificate/household register must be submitted to verify the relationship between Third Party Payor and Proposer/Policyowner/Life
Proposed/Life Assured. 如第三者付款為超過 500,000 港元等值之金額,第三者付款人必須遞交關係證明文件如結婚證書/出世紙/內地戶口證明文件之副
本以核實第三者付款人與投保人/保單持有人/受保人的關係。
5. The maximum amount of cash payment that is accepted at Cashier is HKD120,000/USD15,000(or equivalent) per payment installment
per policy. 於繳費處以現金繳費,每份保單每期繳費的交易金額上限為120,000 港元/15,000 美元(或等值)。

Part 2
第二部分 Payment Amount & Method 繳款金額及方法
1. HKD policies only accept HKD payment. For non-HKD policies, payments can be made in either the policy currency or HKD.If you wish to
make payment in MOP, the transaction amount will be converted into equivalent amount of HKD at the prevailing exchange rate on the
transaction date for settlement. Your payments in HKD for foreign currency policies may be subject to change in view of exchange rate
market fluctuation, and you should be aware of the exchange rate risks. You may need to pay any shortfall in the premium to maintain
your coverage without being affected if there is any discrepancy in premium due to exchange rate fluctuations. Any overpayment of
premium will be credited to the premium deposit account. Please visit prudential.com.hk/exchange-rates-mac-en for our prevailing
exchange rate in different currencies.港元保單只接受以港元付款;非港元保單接受以港元或保單貨幣付款。如 閣下希望以澳門元繳付費用,付款金額
會以交易當日之匯率兌換為等值的港元以作結算。以港元繳交外幣保單的繳款可能會因應匯率市場波動而有所變動,您應留意匯率風險。如因匯率波動而造成
繳費不足,您或需補交保費差額以維持您的保障不受影響;多繳保費將會存入至保費儲蓄戶口。請瀏覽 prudential.com.hk/exchange-rate-macs 以獲取
不同貨幣的現行匯率。
2. If payment was made by credit / debit card / telegraphic transfer and there is subsequently a refund, such refund will be directly credited
to the credit card account holder / bank account holder / remitter (as the case may be). Any handling charge or exchange rate difference
arising from such refund will be borne by credit / debit cardholder / bank account holder / remitter. 如以信用卡/借記卡/電匯繳款而其後發生
退款,該退款將直接退回予信用卡卡主/借記卡卡主/匯款人之賬戶內(視乎情況而定)。信用卡公司/發卡機構在收款及退款時徵收之手續費或使用不同匯率而產
生之外匯差額將由信用卡/借記卡卡主/匯款人承擔。
3. If the third party payment is over HKD200,000 equivalent, a copy of the identity card / passport / travel document of the Third Party
Payor must be submitted. 如第三者付款為超過 200,000 港元等值之金額,第三者付款人必須遞交身份證/護照/旅行證件之副本。
4. If the third party payment is over HKD 500,000 equivalent, a copy of the relationship proof such as marriage certificate/birth
certificate/household register must be submitted to verify the relationship between Third Party Payor and Proposer/Policyowner/Life
Proposed/Life Assured. 如第三者付款為超過 500,000 港元等值之金額,第三者付款人必須遞交關係證明文件如結婚證書/出世紙/內地戶口證明文件之副
本以核實第三者付款人與投保人/保單持有人/受保人的關係。
5. The maximum amount of cash payment that is accepted at Cashier is HKD120,000/USD15,000(or equivalent) per payment installment
per policy. 於繳費處以現金繳費,每份保單每期繳費的交易金額上限為120,000 港元/15,000 美元(或等值)。

Important Notes 重要提示:
1. This form is applicable to HKD or MOP Account set up in Bank of China Macau Branch or Bank of China (Macau) only. 此表格只適用於在中國銀行澳門
分行或中國銀行(澳門)開設之港元或澳門元賬戶。
2. Please complete in BLOCK LETTERS. 請以正楷填寫。
3. Please return to Prudential Hong Kong Limited (Macau Branch) ("Prudential") within 30 days after signing this form. 請於簽署此表格後30天內交回保誠
保險有限公司(澳門分行)
(「保誠」)處理。
4. Please do not sign on blank or incomplete form. 請勿在空白表格或尚未填妥的表格上簽署。
5. Any changes or amendments in this form must be countersigned by the Policyowner in full signature. 保單持有人必須在此表格內任何更改或修改的
地方簽署作實。
6. Policyowner MUST sign and date in Part 4 of this form. 保單持有人必須在此表格第四部分簽署及填寫簽署日期。
7. Please pay 1 premium installment in advance as it takes 21 days for the Direct Debit Authorization to set up. 設立直接付款授權需時21天,請預付1期保費。
8. Upon completion of this Direct Debit Authorization set up request, the payment method will be defaulted to autopay via bank account, and the existing autopay
arrangement, if any, will be stopped immediately. 完成設立直接付款授權申請後,保單之繳費方法將自動設定為銀行戶口自動轉賬,而原有的
自動轉賬設定(如有)會即時終止。
9. Please complete the form in appropriate position as instructed, any information written in non-designated blank spaces will not be processed. R $ Itt
表格之指示於適當的位置填寫資料,於其他非指定空白位置填寫的資料恕不受理。
10. Prudential shall have the right to reject this form if you fail to fulfil Prudential's requirements. 若閣下未能符合保誠的有關規定,保誠有權拒絕此
表格。
11. Receipt of this form by Financial Consultants does not constitute receipt by Prudential. 理財顧問收到此表格並不代表保誠亦已收到。
12. In any circumstances, a person who is not a party to the above policy (including but not limited to the Life Assured or the Beneficiary) has no right to enforce
any of the terms of the above policy. 任何不是上述保單某一方的人士或實體(包括但不限於受保人或受益人),在任何情況下均不能強制
執行上述保單的任何條款。
Part 1a 第一部分 甲部 Direct Debit Authorization and Declaration 直接付款授權和聲明
I/ We hereby authorize Bank of China Macau Branch / Bank of China (Macau) (hereinafter referred to as "the Bank") to effect transfers from my/ our account
specified below to the account of Prudential Hong Kong Limited (Macau Branch) ("Prudential"), details of which specified below, such sum of sums as Prudential
may from time to time advise the Bank. This authorization shall remain valid until further notice.
I/ We further agree that:
本人/吾等茲授權中國銀行澳門分行/中國銀行(澳門)(以下簡稱 貴銀行),根據保誠保險有限公司(澳門分行)(「保誠」)不時給予
貴銀行之指示,在本人/吾等於 貴銀行開立之賬戶(賬戶號碼附誌如下)內支取款項,轉賬予保誠之賬戶以繳付有關費用,直至另行書
面通知為止。本人/吾等知悉遵守下述條款辦理:
1. The Bank may effect transfers from my/our said account such sum or sums as advised by Prudential at any time with immediate effect. $R 1T ## F1 ( Ept Erg
付款通知即可支付,款項按保誠所提供之金額扣除。
2. Under no circumstances shall the Bank be held responsible for any consequence(s) as a result of unsuccessful transfer of fund(s) from my/our said account.
如該賬款未能自本人/吾等之銀行賬戶內支付,一切責任及後果,概與 貴銀行無涉。
3. Any variation or cancellation of this authorization has to be given by notice in writing. This authorization shall remain valid unless such notice is given to and
received by the Bank. For 6 consecutive times, transfers are not effected due to no sufficient available fund in my/our said account, the Bank may at its own
discretion not to comply with or act further with this authorization without notice to me/us. 如有任何令授權書失效之變更,本人/吾等必須書面
通知 貴銀行。貴銀行在收到書面通知前,本授權書繼續有效。但如本人/吾等之銀行賬戶連續六次因賬戶可用餘額不足而未能支付
賬款,則貴銀行可有權不經通知而撤銷此項授權。
4. Service charge of the Bank will be debited from my/our said account. 貴銀行有權徵收服務費用,並可由本人/吾等之銀行賬戶內支付。
5. The Bank may disclose details of my/our said account to any other third party if the Bank finds it necessary and appropriate. 貴銀行認為必要和適當時,
不必通知或取得本人/吾等同意有權將有關的賬戶資料披露給其他機構。
6. The Bank shall be entitled to convert the sum or sums to be transferred to the account of Prudential into HKD at a rate determined by the Bank. If the
policy currency is HKD, the premium will be settled in HKD directly. If the policy currency is not HKD, the HKD amount will be converted to the policy currency
at a rate determined by Prudential to for settlement. Please visit prudential.com.hk/exchange-rates-mac-en for our prevailing exchange rate in different
currencies. 本人 / 吾等授權 貴銀行可根據自動扣賬當天 貴銀行所指定的匯率將轉賬款項兌換成港元以轉賬予保誠之帳戶。如保單貨幣
為港元,保費會直接以港元結算。如保單貨幣並非港元,有關港元金額將會根據保誠所指定的匯率兌換為保單貨幣以作結算。請瀏覽
prudential.com.hk/exchange-rates-mac以獲取不同貨幣的現行匯率。
7. The Bank shall not be obliged to ascertain whether or not notice of any such transfer has been given to me/us. 本人 / 吾等同意 貴銀行無義務確定該等
支款通知是否已交予本人/吾等。
8. Full responsibility for any overdraft (or increase in existing overdraft) on my/our account which may arise as a result of any such transfer(s) shall be jointly
and severally accepted by me/us. 本人 / 吾等願共同及各別承擔因該等支款而令本人/吾等之銀行賬戶出現透支(或令現時透支增加)之
全部責任。
LAPA/PRMMBD (06/24)
Prudential Hong Kong Limited (Macau Branch) 保誠保險有限公司(澳門分行)
Part of Prudential plc (United Kingdom) 保誠集團成員

results.content_en:
which such article or articles may have as part of such pair or set not more than a
proportionate part of the insured value of the pair or set.
5.
Precautions
The Insured shall take all ordinary reasonable precautions to prevent accidents and losses and
to comply with all statutory obligations and regulations imposed by any authority.
IMPORTANT - the Insured is requested to read this Policy. If any error or omission be found, the Policy should be returned to the issuing Office for correction.
46.
Fraud
If any claim shall be fraudulent or intentionally exaggerated or if any false declaration or statement
shall be made then this Policy shall be void and no claim be payable.
7.
Claims
In the event of any happening which may give rise to a claim under this Policy the Insured
Person or the Insured Person's representatives
a)
shall give immediate notice thereof in writing to the Company and shall at his/her own
expense furnish to the Company all such certificates reports information and evidence in
such form and of such nature as the Company may reasonably require for the purpose
of ascertaining its liability as soon as possible.
b)
the Company shall not be liable if discovery of loss and notification of claim is not made
within 31 (thirty-one) days of the occurrence. All practicable steps shall be taken by
the Insured Person to discover and punish the guilty person or persons and to trace
and recover the property lost. The Insured Person shall notify the golf course or the
driving range or the police authority immediately upon discovery of any loss the result
of burglary or theft.
c)
if a claim may arise under Section I the Insured Person shall notify or forward to the
Company every letter claim writ summons or process immediately on receipt and not
make any admission of liability offer promise payment or indemnity without the written
consent of the Company.
d)
in the case of a claim under Section II or III shall from time to time when required by
the Company submit himself/herself to be examined by a Registered Medical Practitioner
appointed by the Company. In the case of death where any reasonable doubt exists
as to the cause thereof a Registered Medical Practitioner appointed by the Company
shall be allowed to make a post-mortem examination of the body of the Insured Person
at the Company's expenses.
8.
Subrogation/Discharge of Liability
The Company shall be entitled
a)
to take over and conduct in the name of the Insured the defence or settlement of
any claim against the Insured Person or to prosecute in the name of the Insured for
its own benefit any claim for indemnity or damages or otherwise and the Insured shall
give all such information and assistance as the Company may require.
b)
to pay at any time to the Insured in respect of any one claim or number of claims against
the Insured arising out of any one occurrence or of a number of occurrence arising
directly or indirectly from one source or original cause the sum stated in the limits of
liability applicable to Section I (after deduction of any sum or sums already paid as
compensation) or any lesser amount for which such claim or claims can be settled
and upon such payment the Company shall relinquish conduct and control of and be
under no further liability under Section I in connection with such claim or claims.
9.
Non-transfer of Insured's Rights
Unless otherwise expressly stated nothing contained herein shall give any rights against the
Company to any person other than the Insured. Further the Company shall not bound by any
passing of the interest of the Insured otherwise than by death or operation of law unless and
until the Company shall by endorsement declare the Policy to be continued. The extension of
the Company's liability in respect of the property or liability of any person other than Insured
shall give no right of claim under this Policy to such person the intention being that the Insured
shall in all cases claim for and on behalf of such person and the receipt of the Insured shall in
any case absolutely discharge the Company's liability under this Policy in respect of such loss.
In the event of death of the Insured the Company will in respect of any liability incurred by
the Insured under Section I indemnify the Insured's legal personal representatives in the terms
of and subject to the limitations of the Section concerned provided that such legal personal
representatives shall as though they were the Insured observe fulfil and be subject to the terms
conditions and exceptions of the Policy so far as they can apply.
10.
Premium
a)
If the Payment Method selected is by credit card premium of this Policy shall be paid
from the Insured's nominated account in accordance with the Collection Date as stated
in the Schedule. The Company reserves the right to change the Collection Date without
prior notice.
b)
If the Payment Method is by credit card the Insured may request to change the nominated
account from which premium has been collected by completing and returning a new
Payment Details Amendment Form to the Company before the Policy expiry date.
Provided that the setup of the new nominated account is confirmed the Company will
start the premium collection from the account on the Collection Date of the upcoming
year.
c)
For any termination of or adjustment in this Policy the Company will retain the minimum
premium which is HK$300 for each Policy and return the balance if any to the Insured.
11.
Renewal
a)
If the Payment Method selected is by credit card the Policy will be renewed automatically
on a yearly basis upon the successful premium collection for its renewal and subject
to the normal underwriting requirements of the Company unless written notice of
cancellation has been received by the Company before the corresponding Collection
Date.
b)
If the Payment Method is by credit card premium for the upcoming year will be collected
on the Collection Date of renewal from the Insured's nominated account automatically.
c)
If the marital status of any Insured Person has changed which invalidates the eligibility
of the Insured Person concerned for being insured under Family Cover the Insured is
required to submit a written declaration of such change upon renewal and premium
for the renewal shall be adjusted accordingly.
d)
If the child(ren) who is/are insured under Family Cover reach(es) the age of 18 (eighteen)
upon renewal the Company shall no longer invite the renewal to the child(ren) concerned
under the Family Cover. The Insured is requested to separately insure the child(ren)
individually and the child(ren) shall be deemed as the policyholder of his/her own Policy.
12.
Jurisdiction
This Policy shall be governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of Hong Kong. The
parties agree to submit to the exclusive jurisdiction of Hong Kong Court.
13.
Cancellation
The Company may cancel this Policy by sending 7 (seven) days' notice by registered letter
to the Insured at his/her last known address and in such event the Insured shall be entitled
to the return of a proportionate part of the Premium corresponding to the unexpired portion
of the Period of Insurance.
The Insured may cancel this Policy by giving the Company 7 (seven) days' notice in writing.
In such case the Company will retain the customary short period rate for the time the Policy
has been in force and refund the balance to the Insured provided that no claim has been
made during the current Period of Insurance.
14.
Arbitration
Any dispute, controversy, difference or claim arising out of or relating to this Policy, including the
existence, validity, interpretation, performance, breach or termination thereof or any dispute
regarding non-contractual obligations arising out of or relating to it shall be referred to and finally
resolved by arbitration administered by the Hong Kong International Arbitration Centre (HKIAC)
under the HKIAC Administered Arbitration Rules in force when the Notice of Arbitration is
submitted. The law of this arbitration clause shall be Hong Kong law. The seat of arbitration shall
be Hong Kong. The number of arbitrators shall be one. The arbitration proceedings shall be
conducted in English. If the Company shall disclaim liability to the Insured for any claim under this
Policy and such claim shall not within twelve calendar months from the date of such disclaimer
have been referred to arbitration in accordance with this arbitration clause, then the claim shall for
all purposes be deemed to have been abandoned and shall not thereafter be recoverable.
15.
Other Insurances
If at the time of the happening of any occurrence covered by this Policy (except for the benefit
of Section II and VI) there is any other existing insurance covering the same liability or part
thereof the Company shall not be liable to pay or contribute more than its ratable proportion
of any sum payable in respect of such occurrence.
16.
Third Party Right
A person or entity who is not a party to this Policy shall have no rights under the Contracts
(Rights of Third Parties) Ordinance (Cap. 623 of the Laws of Hong Kong) to enforce any terms
of this Policy.
17.
Prevailing Provisions
The terms and conditions of this Policy are set out in both English and Chinese. In the event
that conflicts or inconsistencies arise between the English and Chinese version, the English
version shall prevail.
IMPORTANT - the Insured is requested to read this Policy. If any error or omission be found, the Policy should be returned to the issuing Office for correction.
5
